I'm already working on the story actually.  Still these Rocak won't be 
tied in with my original mention of them.  They will be totally 
independent.  They will be really advanced, but not so much as the 
Vok.  Besides you can always dub it illegal if you're a council 
member, and if not I wasn't talking to you anyway.

obssessive

be my
